name: Sportronix
tag_list: sport, sports, motor, motorsports, racing, baseball, basketball, futbol, football, soccer, cricket, nascar, irl, f1, mlb, nba, nfl, fifa, fia, intelligent, artificial, intelligence, analytics, stats
overview:
Sportronix is a sports technology firm.

The company serves the sports industry by focusing on sports data solutions, sports knowledge capture and design, and intelligent software engines. Sportronix consulting services are project management aware, while hard products are custom. The company ultilizes both SaaS and PaaS models. Clients are teams, venues, data centers, sanctioning organizations, officials, timing/scoring providers, and more. The company has two patent pending software design applications, and is supported by a science advisory board. Sportronix has an affinity for racing environments.
